function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate adaptation to COVID-19 disruptions in the service industry","Impact":"Increase in virus transmission and business instability","Mitigation":"Implement adaptive strategies, prioritize safety measures, and maintain social distancing","Technologies":"Contactless technologies, online reservation systems, and virtual communication tools","People":"Service industry workers, customers, and the general public","Owner":"Service organizations and government authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of social legitimacy and acceptance of adaptive strategies","Impact":"Lack of compliance and trust, leading to increased virus transmission and business instability","Mitigation":"Build trust through transparency and consistent communication, involve stakeholders in decision-making, and prioritize safety and health in strategies","Technologies":"Social media engagement, public relations tools, and online community platforms","People":"Service industry workers, customers, and the general public","Owner":"Service organizations and government authorities"},{"Description":"Ineffective measures to control virus transmission in service environments","Impact":"Rapid virus spread and potential outbreak clusters","Mitigation":"Implement and enforce strict safety protocols, promote individual responsibility, and invest in air filtration and ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV germicidal lamps, and real-time air quality monitoring devices","People":"Service industry workers, customers, and the general public","Owner":"Service organizations, government authorities, and public health agencies"}]}
